summary: Successfully implemented all 5 enhancement areas from the Beauty Booking Module Enhancement Plan. Created centralized error handler utility (beauty-error-handler.js) with jQuery AJAX, Fetch API, and retry logic support. Enhanced booking form validation with comprehensive field checks, inline error messages, and time slot validation. Added validation utility (beauty-validation.js) for salon registration and service/staff forms. Created UI partials for loading indicators and empty states. Implemented confirmation dialog utility (beauty-confirmation.js) for destructive actions. Added error handlers to all jQuery AJAX calls in dashboard files. Enhanced Fetch API error handling with user-visible messages. Standardized API responses by replacing 2 direct response()->json() calls with trait methods. Created API response format tests. Enhanced API documentation with detailed authentication flow, cURL examples, rate limiting details, and pagination examples. Added comprehensive PHPDoc annotations to key API controller methods with request parameters, response formats, and examples.
